title: As per the provision of clause 3, each residential/non-residential tenant shall be rehabilitated only for carpet area mentioned in the said clause 3 and such areas shall be clearly shown on the building plan submitted to the Municipal Corporation
clause_text: As per the provision of clause 3, each residential/non-residential tenant shall be rehabilitated only for carpet area mentioned in the said clause 3 and such areas shall be clearly shown on the building plan submitted to the Municipal Corporation.
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order
